#### Package references {-}

```{r, results = 'asis'}
packages <- check_required_packages()
for (pkg in packages) {
  cit <- utils::citation(pkg)
  for (i in seq_along(cit)) {
    cat("+ ")
    print(cit[[i]], style = 'text')
    cat("\n")
  }
}
```
